en: Food for the people of hellfire

questionText.en: Which is not one of the rights of a Muslim upon another Muslim?
questionText.ur: کون سا سیارہ سرخ سیارہ کہلاتا ہے؟
questionText.jp: 赤い惑星として知られる惑星は？

en: If one invites, you accept it
If one dies, you attend the funeral
If one asks for advice, you give sincerely
If one asks for money, you give
